help.title: BirthdayBot's Guide
help.description: Choose a command list or join the [support server](<SUPPORT LINK>) for support.

user_commands.title: User Commands
user_commands.description: Commands that are used to modify your own settings.

fields.name: <PREFIX>birthday <year> <month> <day>
fields.value: Add or update your birthday.

fields.name: <PREFIX>timezone <zone>
fields.value: Set your time zone. The format '<Continent>/<Capital>' usually works. Be sure to check out the list of supported time zones.

fields.name: <PREFIX>hide_age
fields.value: Make your age hidden so it won't appear in birthday announcements.

fields.name: <PREFIX>show_age
fields.value: Make your age visible so it will appear in birthday announcements.

fields.name: <PREFIX>mention
fields.value: Toggle your own mention in birthday announcements on/off.

server_commands.title: Server Commands
server_commands.description: Commands that are used in servers.

fields.name: <PREFIX>today
fields.value: See who has birthday today in the server.

fields.name: <PREFIX>upcoming
fields.value: See who has birthday in the server up to 30 days from now.

fields.name: <PREFIX>recent
fields.value: See who had birthday in the server up to 30 days ago.

fields.name: <PREFIX>birthdays <month>
fields.value: See the server's birthdays in the given month.

fields.name: <PREFIX>stats
fields.value: Get the statistics of the server.

admin_commands.title: Admin Commands
admin_commands.description: Commands that can be used only by server administrators.

fields.name: <PREFIX>channel #channel
fields.value: Set the server's birthday announcement channel.

fields.name: <PREFIX>everyone
fields.value: Toggle mentioning everyone in birthday announcements on/off.

fields.name: <PREFIX>timezones
fields.value: Get a list of supported time zones.

fields.name: <PREFIX>vote
fields.value: Display a list of websites where you can upvote the bot.

fields.name: <PREFIX>support
fields.value: Display information about getting support with the bot.

fields.name: <PREFIX>info
fields.value: View general information about the bot.

fields.name: Notes
fields.value:
* Your time zone is set to **UTC** by default, you can change it with the `timezone` command.
* Your age will be visible in birthday announcements, you can hide it with the `hide_age` command.
* Mentioning yourself in your birthday announcements is **on** by default, you can toggle this setting with the `mention` command.
* To use commands, write the bot's default prefix or mention the bot before the name of the command.

invalid_date.title: Invalid Date
invalid_date.description: The given date is not valid.

fields.name: Possible Causes
fields.value:
* One or more of the parameters are not numbers.
* The month or the day are out of range.
* The year is not a leap year, yet the date is February 29th.
* The given year is earlier than 1940.

invalid_timezone.title: Invalid Time Zone
invalid_timezone.description: The given time zone is not supported.

fields.name: Possible Causes
fields.value:
* You tried to input your country's offset from GMT.
* You are not aware of the fact that the time zone names are **case-sensitive**. They need to be written just like in the time zone list.

fields.name: Hints
fields.value:
* Type `<PREFIX>help timezone`.
* Type `<PREFIX>timezones`.
* Try to use the format **<Continent>/<Capital>**.

timezones.title: Supported Time Zones
timezones.description: The supported time zones are from the Pytz library.

fields.name: A list of Pytz time zones can be found here:
fields.value: <TIMEZONES LINK>

age_hidden.title: Age is now hidden.
age_hidden.description:
Your age will not appear in birthday announcements.
To undo this action, type `<PREFIX>show_age`.

age_visible.title: Age is now visible.
age_visible.description: Your age will appear in birthday announcements.
